name: ProcessTabularModelTask
description: Load a SSAS tabular cube model with data from an an on-premise SQL Server database by processing the cube
author: Dr. John Tunnicliffe

inputs.name: AsServer
inputs.label: SSAS Server Name or IP address
inputs.helpMarkDown: SSAS Server Name or IP address.  Include the instance name and port if necessary (e.g. myserver\myinstance,myport)

inputs.name: CubeDatabaseName
inputs.label: Tabular cube database name that needs processing
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the cube database on the SSAS server that needs to be processed

inputs.name: RefreshType
inputs.label: Processing option
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of processing to perform on the tabular cube database
